answers.answer: I had to do that. I showed up and they said everything was looking fine they just wanted to be safe. Before I finished the night I had gone into labor and severe preeclampsia. my kidneys and liver were going into failure very scary stuff! glad they are keeping a close eye on you! things can happen very quickly with that. Good luck!
Oh wow, that's some scary stuff..i was told i had to be induced if i had it. Did you have to be induced immediately after you found out? and thank you!

I just had to deliver my baby via c-section last Friday due to severe preeclampsia and HELLP syndrome.. I was only 28 weeks.. if they find a lot of protein in your urine and your blood pressure is high they may start you on magnesium it's awful honestly its the worst thing I have ever gone through and now my baby girl is in the NICU ... Thankfully I was able to hold out on giving birth for them to give me two rounds of steroid shots to develop her lungs ... But not always do they deliver right away if you have preeclampsia they may just monitor you in the hospitaluntil you give birth or have you on bed rest it all depends on how bad it is ... I wish you the best of luck

They must suspect you have high blood pressure cause they test your urine I see if you're losing protein. If you're test come back fine then don't worry. Even if you do have high blood pressure they have meds you can take. I took a 24 urine test about a month ago cause I have an elevated blood pressure but my urine checked back fine so they told be just to monitor it at h
Home and if it got to 160/100 then go straight to the hospital but it never goes above 140/79

I had to be tragic but I had preeclampsia my last pregnancy and my son was stillborn. . Not trying to say it would always happen but im pregnant again now and just did another 24 hour urinalysis too. Hang in there with mom and baby its better to err on the side of caution. ..

question: So I once again have to do a 24 hour urime aanalysis. Because Dr suspects I have pre eclampsia. But my blood pressure seemed normal at the er last night. Any ladies experience pre eclampsia and can give me advice before my brain explodes
title: peeing in a jug again :'(
